author: rappoccio
body:
Several JME bugs fixed here:

- AK8 jets needed rawFactor to reapply jet corrections
- AK4 jets needed muon fraction, addressing [this issue](https://github.com/cms-nanoAOD/cmssw/issues/169)
- Trigger objects needed AK8 jets, addressing [this issue](https://github.com/cms-nanoAOD/cmssw/issues/81)

10.1.x version will be forthcoming next.
title: JME bugfixes
